Reviews.Title: “Best Budget Accommodation in London”
Reviews.Author: krandolph1818
Reviews.Content: friend stayed night hotel 27th 28th february paid 80 usd night 40 split price considering paying hostel glad chose instead refurbished 53 tell rest hotel refurbishment looked beautiful booked breakfast included assumed cold continental boy surprised breakfast chose eggs bacon sausage etc english breakfast absolute hotel location 5 minutes paddington connects major tube lines attractions london neighborhood safe women traveling pub close food beer locals hotel staff friendly didnt mind answering tourist questions people hand friendly advice look forward trip london stay hotel athena

Reviews.Title: “What do people want?”
Reviews.Author: stu m
Reviews.Content: girlfriend stopped 2 nights 27th january 2012 £75 night bed breakfast reasonable hotel looks makeover finishing leaves lot desired price pay relatively clean presentable yes hotel london below 4 star isnt hotel sussex gardens 5 minute walk paddington tube station located sense staff english thats fine polite allowed leave bags reception 6 hours check dont hesitate book youre sightsee hotel sleep eat breakfast spot price minor comment size english breakfast offer cereals toast fruit salad fill overall advice book

Reviews.Title: “Decent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: James C
Reviews.Content: stayed family holiday overall athena hotel alright tad mainly looking magnificent sights london pretty location near hyde park madame abby road nice repainting hotel smelt fairly bad pleased included breakfast pretty hope helps

Reviews.Title: “Very disappointing”
Reviews.Author: T011
Reviews.Content: terrible stay staff rude especially serve breakfast morning dusty curtains looked theyve cleaned theyve bed covers looked terrible furthermore amenities stay hotels

Reviews.Title: “LEFT QUICKLY!!!!”
Reviews.Author: 189473Chris
Reviews.Content: tthe check leave morning clean broken utilities major renovation dissapointed morning hotel athena hotel satisfied

Reviews.Title: “A Halleluja-moment”
Reviews.Author: Locisen
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel thinking dump concidering price 5 people 4 nights astonished hotel recently gone renovation pictures reviewers date updated standard lobby breakfast assume updated aswell satisfied stay definetly stayed 24 perception based

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money, property being renovated”
Reviews.Author: RagazzaDaRoma
Reviews.Content: value money hotel especially single travellers looking terms basics lift wifi breakfast included price hotel undergoing renovations day yesterday 5 feb nearly finished reception brand upgrade single double fine person double single traveller couples check size bed bigger available breakfast offered stay hotels offer adequate nice hotel staff extremely helpful helping bring bags upstairs shopping trips helped answer questions overall value money easy hotel 5 mins walk paddington 10 mins walk lancaster gate red central line charge 5 extra payment credit card

Reviews.Title: “Falty Towers”
Reviews.Author: MattNZKiwi
Reviews.Content: didnt start guy desk acted hadnt slept 3 days looked happy customer mouse looks failed attempt removing cheese trap modern card key door didnt reception instead getting card told try trick obviously happens didnt seat reception trick trying trick 15 times door fair 4th day getting pretty breaking night especially bathroom seriously renovations bathroom tiles cracked grouting breaking attached bathroom wall broken rusty mark sink blocked shower water minute ok minute water cold breakfast pathetic times breakfast news slept ok ultimately glad leave

Reviews.Title: “GOOD VALUE BUDGET HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: leonardcohen
Reviews.Content: stayed night budget hotel extremely value averaged â£32 person decor bit tired dated 32 extremely clean lots towels soap extra blankets pillows teabags coffee sachets receptionist pleasant helpful lady serving breakfast price paid am satisfied hotel service excellent location near paddington tube lots eat remember cheap priced hotel london comments

Reviews.Title: “Hands down the worst place I have ever stayed..”
Reviews.Author: Missaki
Reviews.Content: dont start tiny mattress disgusting pilows sleep clothes wer bed bags carpet dirty hair shower awful water breakfast ok didnt feel touching cooked establishment waiter couldnt speak word english rude owners havent spent penny renovating care guess money providing worth 65

Reviews.Title: “Not too bad but you get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: Leoniecat
Reviews.Content: budget booked reading mixed reviews trip advisor wed cant impressed hotel paid â£79 breakfast didnt expect positives reception staff friendly breakfast wasnt bad hot water ensuite unfortunately thats positives paid double 34 width bed drawers desk didnt fit properly managed filthy inside wouldnt heated towel rail ensuite didnt freezing shower curtain filthy stains bed cover plumbing bedroom upstairs noisy person upstairs walked bizarre plastic squeaking sound dont rate hotel highly budget stopping night personally wed stay

HotelInfo.Name: Athena Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 110-114 Sussex Gardens | Paddington, London W2 1UA, England
